member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.BuzHashBase
member.summary:
Base implementation of BuzHash as specified at http://www.serve.net/buz/hash.adt/java.002.html.
Relies on a random table of 256 (preferably distinct) 64-bit integers. Also can be set to use left or right rotation when running the rotate step.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.BuzHashBase.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.UInt64},System.Data.HashFunction.BuzHashBase.CircularShiftDirection,System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.exception: HashSize set to an invalid value.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.BuzHashBase.CShift(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotate bits of input byte by amount specified. Shifts left or right based on ShiftDirection parameter.
member.param: Number of bits to shift the integer by.
member.returns: Byte value after rotating by the specified amount of bits.

member.returns: UInt16 value after rotating by the specified amount of bits.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.DefaultBuzHash
member.summary:
Basic implementation of class.
Uses randomly generated table and left circular shift.
